DOC.brief_title: miPlan : A Trial miPlan Intervention vs. Standard Care
DOC.detailed_description: Using experience digital medium , behavior theory , client-centered intervention , family planning , prototyped digital application ( `` app '' ) —miPlan—to use clinic waiting room prior contraceptive visit . The goal research refine app conduct randomize control trial miPlan intervention vs. standard care contraceptive counseling . The aim study understand miPlan 's impact term contraceptive knowledge , intention behavior . The primary outcome LARC uptake , measure via chart review clinic discharge , i.e . immediately follow patient 's family planning visit . The secondary outcome contraceptive use discharge ( measure via chart review immediately follow patient 's family planning visit ) , self-efficacy decisional balance ( measure via adapt validated scale ) highly effective contraception post-app use ( measure immediately follow intervention prior contraceptive counseling session ) , contraceptive satisfaction ( measure 3 month post baseline ) , intention continue method use ( measure 3 month post baseline ) . The research consist baseline activity well three-month follow-up call .
DOC.criteria: African American Latina female sexually active male partner ( ) within past 6 month , age 15 29 year present contraception initiation English speaking currently pregnant intend pregnancy within next 6 month currently use LARC highly intend LARC enrollment
